column1: This file will be used to upload data to the NelsonDB. FIELD NAMES CAN BE ADDED, BUT SHOULD BE DONE SPARINGLY

column7: Definition
The experiment name to which this Isolate is a part of.
A unique identifier for the Isolate, such as 102G. MUST BE UNIQUE
The location of where the Isolate is located. Leave blank if not applicable.
The date when the Isolate was stocked. Recommended format : 2015-01-30 14:50. Leave blank if not applicable.
The visible color of the extract. Leave blank if not applicable.
The organism that the extract was from. Example: Fungus, Bacterial. Leave blank if not applicable.
Any additional comments. Leave blank if not applicable.
The Field Name from which the Isolate was collected. Example Aurora NY. Leave blank if not relevant.
The Culture ID from which the Isolate was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The DNA ID from which the Isolate was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The Plant ID from which the Isolate was collected. Example 08PN0023_001. Leave blank if Isolate not collected from a plant.
The Plot ID from which the Isolate was collected. Example 09PN0023. Leave blank if not applicable.
The Plate ID from which the Isolate was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The Tissue ID from which the Isolate was collected. Leave blank if Isolate not collected from a tissue.
The Seed ID from which the Isolate is associated. Leave blank if not applicable.
The Sample ID from which the Isolate was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The Microbe ID from which the Isolate was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The Well ID from which the Isolate was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The IsolateStock ID from which the Isolate was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
Definition
The city, state, country, zipcode where the location is.
A descriptive name for the location. MUST BE UNIQUE
The building name. Example: Plant Science, Emerson
The room number or name
The shelf in which the Isolate is located. Example: 1, 2, 3
The column in which the Isolate is located. Example: A, B, C
The box which the Isolate is in.
Any additional comments about the location of the Isolate.

column2: For recording information about a locality.

column7: Definition
The locality's city name.
The locality's state.
The locality's country.
The locality's zipcode.
